name: Reindeer with Lights Christmas Mug
description:
This new Christmas range is inspired by how animals might get involved in the seasons festive activities. This Reindeer has decorated himself up for the occasion with some fairy lights, I think he looks super!

Everybody loves a mug! Even the hard-to-buy-for amongst you can appreciate a mug with a quirky design on it.

It arrives in a sturdy Mellor Ware box with a tiny story book attached to the handle.

The Mellor Ware tea party set is a contemporary alternative to Granny’s “best” teaware. It’s a modern day heirloom to be collected, treasured but most importantly used everyday!

The concept of the range is that you can collect multiple items of chinaware, adding different characters to your own unique tea party set. Each set will then tell your own individual tale of British wildlife having a tea party!

All items are bone china, and are dishwasher and microwave safe. To produce them, they are decorated by hand either in Sheffield or Stoke, using decals of Lianne Mellor’s watercolour illustrations. The hand finished nature of the pieces means that there might be slight differences between the individual items, this adds to the uniqueness and charm of the collection. No two pieces will ever be identical!

name: Party Invites
description:
Hand written invites are still the best way to surround your event with excitement! This pack is perfect for inviting your friends over for a Tea party, Birthday bash or other kind of shindig! 

Each pack contains:
10 X Invitations with extra space for important information.
10 X Brown paper envelopes 
10 X Stickers in assorted party designs!

Designed, printed and packaged in the UK.

name: Correspondence Kit
description:
Nothing beats a thoughtful, heartfelt letter dropping through your letterbox! The note-lets are perfect for posting to your loved ones near and far filled with news, gossip or even a poem!

Each pack contains:
6 X Note-lets in 3 different designs 
6 X Brown paper envelopes 
6 X Stickers for decorating your envelopes

Designed, printed and packaged in the UK.

name: Large trinket box - Mole Hedgehog cherries
description:
Our gift ware range has expanded to include three sizes of trinket boxes. 
They make a perfect gift on their own, or used to present something special inside!

Here we have a large trinket box measuring approximately 4” diameter.
This design depicts a mole decorating cakes with cherries, while the hedgehog helps him by holding the cherries! 
 

The concept of the range is that you can collect multiple items of chinaware, adding different characters to your own unique tea party set. Each set will then tell your own individual tale of British wildlife having a tea party!

All items are bone china, to produce them, they are decorated by hand in Sheffield, using decals of Lianne Mellor’s watercolour illustrations. The hand finished nature of the pieces means that there might be slight differences between the individual items, this adds to the uniqueness and charm of the collection. No two pieces will ever be identical!

name: Side plate - Lion napkin hat
description:
We all know that British summertime can often leave a lot to be desires. Inspired by this and my sympathy for all of the animals brought to our zoos to endure our crazy weather, I created this range! There are 3 sunny ones and 3 rainy ones - which is your favourite? 

Measuring in at a practical 8.5” our side plates are perfectly sized for cake, sandwiches and salads. Why not pair it up with a striking coloured dinner plate for a contemporary table setting, or you could even hang a selection on your wall to make a lovely display!

The Mellor Ware tea party set is a contemporary alternative to Granny’s “best” teaware. It’s a modern day heirloom to be collected, treasured but most importantly used everyday!

name: Mug - New deer picnic
description:
This range is inspired by the quintessentially British pastimes of afternoon teas, garden parties and quirky dances and the idea that when our back are turned, foxes, badgers, squirrels and hedgehogs come out in force to act out these very English activities.

It’s almost as if they’ve been watching us have all the fun, and are now joining in in their own way! I wonder what they’ll get up to next! This design depicts a deer having a picnic, with a badger unpacking a hamper, and birds helping lay out sandwiches. 

Everybody loves a mug! Even the hard-to-buy-for amongst you can appreciate a mug with a quirky design on it.

This range is inspired by the quintessentially British pastimes of afternoon teas, garden parties and quirky dances and the idea that when our back are turned, foxes, badgers, squirrels and hedgehogs come out in force to act out these very English activities.

It’s almost as if they’ve been watching us have all the fun, and are now joining in in their own way! I wonder what they’ll get up to next! This design depicts a fox eating sandwiches from a tray on a squirrels back, while a hare picks lumps of cheese from the spikes of a hedgehog!

A generously sized 6-cup teapot, perfect for pouring (no drips) and really brightens up your kitchen. Why not treat the tea lover in your life?

It arrives in a sturdy Mellor Ware box with a tiny story book attached to the handle.

The Mellor Ware tea party set is a contemporary alternative to Granny’s “best” teaware. It’s a modern day heirloom to be collected, treasured but most importantly used everyday!

The concept of the range is that you can collect multiple items of chinaware, adding different characters to your own unique tea party set. Each set will then tell your own individual tale of British wildlife having a tea party!

All items are bone china, and are dishwasher and microwave safe. To produce them, they are decorated by hand either in Sheffield or Stoke, using decals of Lianne Mellor’s watercolour illustrations. The hand finished nature of the pieces means that there might be slight differences between the individual items, this adds to the uniqueness and charm of the collection. No two pieces will ever be identical!

It’s almost as if they’ve been watching us have all the fun, and are now joining in in their own way! I wonder what they’ll get up to next! This design depicts a mole decorating cakes with cherries, while the hedgehog helps him by holding the cherries!

A cute dumpy cream jug, hand-cast in Stoke. Ideal for serving all your liquid things including sauces, creams and gravy! It holds 1/2 a pint of liquid so it’s a nice generous size.

It arrives in a sturdy Mellor Ware box with a tiny story book attached to the handle.

The Mellor Ware tea party set is a contemporary alternative to Granny’s “best” teaware. It’s a modern day heirloom to be collected, treasured but most importantly used everyday!

The concept of the range is that you can collect multiple items of chinaware, adding different characters to your own unique tea party set. Each set will then tell your own individual tale of British wildlife having a tea party!

All items are bone china, and are dishwasher and microwave safe. To produce them, they are decorated by hand either in Sheffield or Stoke, using decals of Lianne Mellor’s watercolour illustrations. The hand finished nature of the pieces means that there might be slight differences between the individual items, this adds to the uniqueness and charm of the collection. No two pieces will ever be identical!
